sentences.sContent: "I didn't ask you to come. Incidentally, why have you come?"
sentences.sCn: “我没有叫你来。顺便问一下，你为什么来呢？”

remMethod.val: 来自incident(n. 事件 adj. 附带的)

words.tran: [光] 入射的；附带的；易发生的，伴随而来的
附带的；偶然的；容易发生的
附带事件；偶然事件；杂项

trans.tranOther: You use incidentally to introduce a point that is not directly relevant to what you are saying, often a question or extra information that you have just thought of
